ul.li: Git is distributed - everybody works with his/her own repository.
4 ways how to setup a repository
Initialize new empty repository (new project): git init
Initialize new repository based on existing sources: git init
Clone existing repository (join projects): git clone
Copy existing repository (not recommended): manual copy (i.e. cp, rsync)
